name: CSSPseudoElement
description: The CSSPseudoElement interface represents a pseudo-element that may be the target of an event or animated using the Web Animations API. Instances of this interface may be obtained by calling Element.pseudo().

refs.name: CSS Pseudo-Elements Level 4
refs.description: The definition of 'CSSPseudoElement' in the 'CSS Pseudo-Elements Level 4' specification.
